casebody.data:
99-0008 (La. 4/23/99)

STATE of Louisiana v. Stephen J. BROUSSARD. No. 99-KP-0008. Supreme Court of Louisiana. April 23, 1999.

IN RE: Broussard, Stephen J.; — Defendants); Applying for Supervisory and/or *881Remedial Writs; Parish of St. Martin 16th Judicial District Court Div. “C” Number 96-174,738; to the Court of Appeal, Third Circuit, Number KW98-0774

Denied. La.C.Cr.P. art. 930.3; State ex rel. Melinie v. State, 93-1380 (La.1/12/96), 665 So.2d 1172.

CALOGERO, C.J. not on panel.
